subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous battlefield was located at Amber?
question_hi: अम्बे पर पहला मंहर का कौन सा स्थित था?
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati took place at Amber, where Raja Rai Singh, the fifth king of Amer, fought valiantly against Mughal Emperor Akbar.

explanation_en: Amber Fort, also known as Amer Fort, was built by Raja Man Singh I in the early 16th century as the capital of the Kachhwaha Rajput clan.
